basics.name: Francisco Cerdas Ureña
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: I'm a experienced developer, operating on the entire software life cycle, from conception to a product release working with multiples programming languages. Currently, in love with NodeJS and all the Javascript World (FrontEnd & BackEnd). I like exploring other languages and approaches, so, I spend some time playing with Python, Arduino and Elixir/Erlang. I like the collaborative environments, test driven development, teamwork and modern software patterns. You can check my Github profile where you can find my personal projects.

work.summary: SOIN its an IT company with national prestige, it also has offices in other countries like Spain, Mexico, El Salvador due to its excellent technological solutions. Part of my work at SOIN involves:
highlights: Develop modules and bug fixes for the SIF, an ERP solution used by Televisa, Bimbo, P.M.I PEMEX and goverment institutions in Costa Rica.
Design, develop and maintain QueComemos, the biggest food delivery service in Costa Rica, for iOS, Android and Web.
Design, develop and maintain Receta Digital, a web app to control prescriptions, drugs and pharmacies in Costa Rica.
Design, develop and maintain Tapp, the biggest loyalty service and app in Costa Rica.

courses: MongoDB, Inc. - M101JS: MongoDB for Node.js Developers

references.name: Heriberto Ureña (burenam17@gmail.com) - coworkers at SOIN
references.reference: It's my pleasure to recommend Francisco, we work together at SOIN and he proved that he will be a valuable professional to any company as web developer.
